newsitem.title: EGYPT: Egyptian pound averages 3.3944/3.3961 to dlr.
newsitem.headline: Egyptian pound averages 3.3944/3.3961 to dlr.

text.p: Private-sector Egyptian banks said the dollar ranged from 3.3940 to 3.3950 bid and 3.3945 to 3.3970 offered on Tuesday in the interbank market.
A survey of five actively trading banks gave average rates of 3.3944 pounds bid and 3.3961 offered. The averages compared with 3.3946 pounds bid and 3.3967 offered on Monday.
The Central Bank calculated the average exchange rate at midday (1000 GMT) as 3.391478 buy and 3.397702 sell.
